Name: Restaurant Manager Simulator
About the game: Do you think you are living a hard & stressful life? Try this new simulator game of Restaurant Manager Simulator... As the leading person of the restaurant, you have to maintain a balance and harmonybetween all the stuff. Your job is a hard and very responsible one. Your mission is to do the best management of your restaurant. Try to be the most succesful restaurant in town. Good Luck! Game Features : - The chance to expand the restaurant; - Leading waiters, chefs, couriers, hostesses; - Boosting activities
